entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with rain showers changing to flurries or rain showers overnight. Snow level 2500 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending early in the morning then sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
